channel.title: Writeup on Codewrecks
channel.description: Recent content in Writeup on Codewrecks

item.title: TryHackMe Writeup: Daily Bugle
item.description: Security is one of my side passion on computer engineering, and if you also like security, Try Hack Me is a nice place to keep under your radar. This morning I had some fun with Daily Bugle machine so I decided to publish my raw writeup. Scan the machine A standard NMap reveals ssh and port 80 opened hosting a nice joomla web site. If you do not want to be especially stealthy, you can let nmap test for vulnerability with standard script, nothing special.
